<h1 id="about">About Me</h1>
<hr style="margin-top:-8px; border-width: 2px">

<div>
<img src="files/profile.jpg" style="width:30%; margin-right: 30px" align="left">

Dapeng Liu is currently a Ph.D. candidate in KAUST of mechanical engineering and plans to defend his Ph.D. dissertation in May 2021. His background in laser diagnostic, fuel kinetics, and shock tube informs his concentrated but competitive approach. Dapeng is fueled by his passion for revealing the kinetics of fuel combustion such as soot formation and fuel oxidation. Dapeng considers himself a ‘forever student,’ eager to both build on his academic foundations in combustion diagnostic and stays updated with the latest diagnostic strategies.


You can find my full CV [here](files/Dapeng_CV.pdf).
</div>
